title: Richard Sherman Shares His Thoughts on NFL, Goodell
itunes:title: Richard Sherman Shares His Thoughts on NFL, Goodell
description:
Seattle Seahawks All-Pro cornerback Richard Sherman discusses a host of issues related to the business of sports, including the relationship between the National Football League and its players. Sherman also talks about the league's declining television ratings, and the reasons for it, as well as what the NFL and its players can do to make the game more attractive to a younger demographic. He also touches on technology, Vince McMahon's proposed XFL reboot and an investment strategy driven by capital preservation. He also talks about the NCAA's college basketball scandal and what changes he'd like to see in college sports.  

Sherman, a Stanford University graduate, is one of the most opinionated and outspoken players in the NFL. He was a member of Seattle's 2013 Super Bowl championship team.
